replies.bodyText:
openScreen() is called by vanilla multiple times in multiple location, and it may also be called by mods. ModifyArg targets individual function call, it modifies the caller. ModifyVariable targets the function itself, result in less amount of asm modification. So I think we should use ModifyVariable.
Since we may have to cancel the call, we need to have both @Inject and @ModifyVariable.
openScreen() is not thread safe, we can assume that it won't be called from a different thread, store the nextScreen in a static variable should be acceptable.
